response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $12,500 for you. This price is significantly lower than the market value and represents an excellent opportunity for you to maximize efficiency and profitability. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12500}
